ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MAVEN STATIC Event Rate: 12 Rate Channels Summed Over Multiple Spins Data Collection

RevisionEvent.Note: Draft metadata created by LFB (ADAPT code), final editing by AK

Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: MAVEN Supra-Thermal And Thermal Ion Composition (STATIC) Particle Distributions. This collection contains files with time-ordered event rate data sorted into 12 rates x 64 energy bin arrays that are summed over multiple spins. Data are derived from APID d9. Description of the STATIC instrument can be found on the STATIC home page https://lasp.colorado.edu/maven/science/instrument-package/static/ and in the STATIC instrument publication https://doi.org/10.1007/s11214-015-0175-6.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator J. P. McFadden for use of these data.

PublicationInfo.PublishedBy: Planetary Data System; Space Physics Data Facility

InformationURL.Name: MAVEN Data Archive at PDS PPI Node

AccessURL.Name: PDS PPI
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format at the Planetary Data System, Planetary Plasma Interactions node

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator D. Larson

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via ftps from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via https from SPDF

AccessURL.Description: Access to ASCII, CDF, and Plots via NASA/GSFC CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator J. P. McFadden. Please acknowledge the Data Providers and CDAWeb when using these data.

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb HAPI Server
AccessURL.Description: Web Service to this product using the HAPI interface

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator J. P. McFadden. Please also acknowledge the Data Providers and CDAWeb when using these data.

Parameter.Name: Epoch time, TT2000
Parameter.Description: UTC time from 01-Jan-2000 12:00:00.000 including leap seconds), one element per ion distribution (NUM_DISTS elements)
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Mission Elapsed Time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Mission elapsed time for this data record, one element per ion distribution (NUM_DISTS elements)
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: SPICE Ephemeris Time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Time used by SPICE program (NUM_DISTS elements)
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Unix Time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Unix time (elapsed seconds since 1970-01-01/00:00 without leap seconds) for this data record, one element per ion distribution. This time is the center time of data collection. (NUM_DISTS elements)
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Interval start time (unix)
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Unix time at the start of data collection. (NUM_DISTS elements)
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Interval end time (unix)
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Unix time at the end of data collection. (NUM_DISTS elements)
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Integration time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Integration time for rate in seconds. (NUM_DISTS elements).

Parameter.Name: Rates
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description:
Rate data for the rate channels sorted by energy step.
* Column 1 Labels from COMPNO_12: ["R2_Time_A","R2_Time_B","R2_Time_C","R2_Time_D","R2_Time_RST","R2_Time_NoStart","R2_Time_Unqual","R2_Time_Qual","R2_Time_AnRej","R2_Time_MaRej","R2_Time_A&B","R2_Time_C&D"]. * Column 2 Labels from COMPNO_64: ["rates@ENERGY0","rates@ENERGY1","rates@ENERGY2","rates@ENERGY3","rates@ENERGY4","rates@ENERGY5","rates@ENERGY6","rates@ENERGY7","rates@ENERGY8","rates@ENERGY9","rates@ENERGY10","rates@ENERGY11","rates@ENERGY12","rates@ENERGY13","rates@ENERGY14","rates@ENERGY15","rates@ENERGY16","rates@ENERGY17","rates@ENERGY18","rates@ENERGY19","rates@ENERGY20","rates@ENERGY21","rates@ENERGY22","rates@ENERGY23","rates@ENERGY24","rates@ENERGY25","rates@ENERGY26","rates@ENERGY27","rates@ENERGY28","rates@ENERGY29","rates@ENERGY30","rates@ENERGY31","rates@ENERGY32","rates@ENERGY33","rates@ENERGY34","rates@ENERGY35","rates@ENERGY36","rates@ENERGY37","rates@ENERGY38","rates@ENERGY39","rates@ENERGY40","rates@ENERGY41","rates@ENERGY42","rates@ENERGY43","rates@ENERGY44","rates@ENERGY45","rates@ENERGY46","rates@ENERGY47","rates@ENERGY48","rates@ENERGY49","rates@ENERGY50","rates@ENERGY51","rates@ENERGY52","rates@ENERGY53","rates@ENERGY54","rates@ENERGY55","rates@ENERGY56","rates@ENERGY57","rates@ENERGY58","rates@ENERGY59","rates@ENERGY60","rates@ENERGY61","rates@ENERGY62","rates@ENERGY63"].
Parameter.Caveats: Rate data for the rate channels sorted by energy step with dimension (NUM_DISTS, NRATE, NENERGY) units=counts/s

Parameter.Name: Quality flag
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

Parameter.Name: Valid flag
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Validity flag codes valid data (bit 0), test pulser on (bit 1), diag mode (bit 2), data comp type (bit 3-4), packet compn (bit 5)
Parameter.Caveats: Validity flag codes valid data (bit 0), test pulser on (bit 1), diagnostic mode (bit 2), data compression type (bit 3-4), packet compression (bit 5) (NUM_DISTS elements)

Parameter.Name: Eprom version
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: An integer designating the version of the flight eprom load. (NUM_DISTS elements)

Parameter.Name: Header
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: A long integer that consists of bytes 12-15 in data packet header. See MAVEN_PF_FSW_021_CTM.xls for definition of header bits. (NUM_DISTS elements)

Parameter.Name: Mode number
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

Parameter.Name: Telemetry rate number
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

Parameter.Name: Sweep index
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Index that identifies the energy and deflector sweep look up tables (LUT) for the sensor
Parameter.Caveats: Index that identifies the energy and deflector sweep look up tables (LUT) for the sensor. SWP_IND is an index that selects the following support data arrays: ENERGY, DENERGY, THETA, DTHETA, PHI, DPHI, DOMEGA, GF and MASS_ARR. (NUM_DISTS elements), EN_IND Le NSWP
